attributes.action: Ask the King to dissolve parliament and call for an immediate general election
attributes.background: There is a petition to call for a general election with over 113.000 current signatures. The government have responded to try and deny this. Our only next option is to ask the King to dissolve parliament.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
